column2: Sandstorm Gold Ltd. engages in the acquisition of gold and other metals purchase agreements and royalties. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 23 full-time employees. The firm provides upfront financing to gold mining companies that are looking for capital and in return receives the right to a percentage of the gold produced from a mine, for the life of the mine. The firm has acquired a portfolio of 188 royalties, of which approximately 21 of the underlying mines are producing. The company is focused on investments towards production profile through the acquisition of additional gold royalties.
